nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 96. Heat index values as high as 109. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 77. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws_periods.name: Monday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 97, with temperatures falling to around 93 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 111. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
